entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:04 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
